alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; St. Charles; Warren (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 22 at 7:30AM CST until February 22 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 AM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN ST. CHARLES...EASTERN LINCOLN AND NORTHEASTERN WARREN COUNTIES... At 729 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wright City, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public reported quarter sized hail 1 mile southwest of Truesdale. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Moscow Mills around 735 AM CST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Fountain N` Lakes, Chain of Rocks and Winfield. This also includes Cuivre River State Park. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 199 and 210. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
